drink.name: Espresso
drink.preparation: Pressurized hot water is forced through finely ground coffee beans, resulting in a concentrated and strong coffee.

drink.name: Cappuccino
drink.preparation: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foamed milk, layered in a cup.

drink.name: Latte
drink.preparation: Espresso and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of frothed milk.
